title: Digital Learning Resource Design for Biodiversity Conservation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic ecology concepts and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning through the ADDIE model, focusing on developing animal conservation apps and assessment tools.

learning_goals: One can design digital biodiversity education materials by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation)
One can develop a prototype of an animal habitat conservation app and evaluation tools through team-based collaboration
One can create digital learning content aligned with SDGs 4 (Quality Education) and 15 (Life on Land)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
